name: Space Vacation
description:
A space vacation gone wrong. Move around to charge your Shake-To-Charge Teleporter to get the beach planet, while avoiding meteors and critters. My second LDJam game, first time working by myself. Music made in beepbox.com and game made in GameMaker Studio. Enjoy!

Controls

  • W = Jump
  • A = Left
  • D = Right
  • S = Shake the teleporter
